alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 26 at 8:50PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MDT/3 AM CDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Dunn, northeast Billings, and southeast McKenzie Counties. * WHEN...Until 200 AM MDT Saturday /300 AM CDT Saturday/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 748 PM MDT /848 PM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Killdeer, Dunn Center, Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area, Grassy Butte, South Fairfield, Fairfield, Little Missouri State Park, Oakdale, Skunk Creek Bay Recreation Area, Twin Buttes and Fort Berthold.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
